item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The Internals of PostgreSQL (93 points | 3 comments)
2. Firefly ‘Blue Ghost’ lunar lander touches down on the moon (627 points | 149 comments)
3. FlakeUI (39 points | 7 comments)
4. Made a scroll bar buddy that walks down the page when you scroll (476 points | 164 comments)
5. MIT 6.S184: Introduction to Flow Matching and Diffusion Models (208 points | 14 comments)
6. Man's brain turned to glass by hot Vesuvius ash cloud (150 points | 50 comments)
7. The weird afterlife of Xbox Kinect (29 points | 17 comments)
8. Fintoc (YC W21) Is Hiring Senior Software Engineer. Live Rent-Free in CL or MX ( | hide)
9. Harvest the sun twice: Agrivoltaics promises sustainable food, energy and water (117 points | 68 comments)
10. Robust Wavefront OBJ model parsing in C (52 points | 35 comments)
11. Virtual museum of socialist era graphic design in Bulgaria (70 points | 7 comments)
12. Geothermal power is a climate moon shot beneath our feet (254 points | 254 comments)
13. Show HN: Tangled – Git collaboration platform built on atproto (111 points | 8 comments)
14. Amazon’s delivery drones are grounded in College Station, Texas (54 points | 124 comments)
15. AWS Cat Qubits Make Quantum Error Correction Effective, Affordable (13 points | 4 comments)
16. Buy Infowars for the Memes (13 points | 7 comments)
17. Speedrunners are vulnerability researchers, they just don't know it yet (324 points | 78 comments)
18. Phlex for Rails Emails: Action Mailer Without ERB (37 points | 5 comments)
19. Gooey rubber that's slowly ruining old hard drives (248 points | 163 comments)
20. Hallucinations in code are the least dangerous form of LLM mistakes (310 points | 234 comments)
21. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (327 points | 122 comments)
22. Smallpond – A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (281 points | 63 comments)
23. ninjavis – generate visualization from ninja build logs (21 points | 3 comments)
24. Blender-made movie Flow takes Oscar (623 points | 97 comments)
25. API design note: Beware of adding an "Other" enum value (211 points | 109 comments)
26. We in-housed our data labelling (52 points | 26 comments)
27. Why do we have both CSRF protection and CORS? (225 points | 108 comments)
28. A Few of the Birds I Love (84 points | 34 comments)
29. I struggled with Git, so I'm making a game to spare others the pain (217 points | 268 comments)
30. Gödel's theorem debunks the most important AI myth – Roger Penrose [video] (169 points | 307 comments)
